channel.title: Home change
channel.description: hey guys how do i change the home and make it so ::home takes me to new place and how do i add portals and npcs that tell people what there for

item.title: Home change
item.dc:creator: @Austin2 -Austin-
item.description:
@Austin2 wrote:

go into ur client.java and do ctrl + F and type in home and ur see cordâ€™s , then go to the new home u want and go on emotes, it says its cords replace the cords from home command to the ones u want. then go into player and replace them cords with the new ones so the new players log in were the new home is. save it+compile then it should work

Read full topic

item.title: Home change
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

also if u want u 2 start in a differnet area go under player.java and look for the current coords, change them 2 wat u want

and that will completelty change home

Read full topic

item.title: Home change
item.dc:creator: @Chris_X116 Chris X116
item.description:
@Chris_X116 wrote:

Just switch the coords.

go where ever u want your new home to be and find the coords. switch them and save them in client.java
